text:
First off, huge thanks to <@U25PYL3Q8> for being so patient here and guiding <@U05A5G5QVP1> :clapping:

Ace, I can see you have been struggling to start local dev server. I'll summarize all the checks here for you so you can make sure you have done those.

1. Get the latest CLI 
2. Install dependencies for extension frontend & serverless
    a. cd src/app/extensions, npm install 
    b. cd src/app/app.functions, npm install
    c. If you did npm install for extensions, you may want to start fresh by deleting it all package-lock.json and node_modules
3. Configure .env inside your app.functions. 
Are you able to run a simple getting started project with local dev?

Also, which documentation page did you use for the step by step walk through?
